mapper.select: SELECT d.DINING_ID, d.DINING_NAME, d.TYPE, d.LOCATION, d.PHONE_NUMBER, d.DINING_CLASSIFICATION, d.DINING_RESV_AVAILABILITY, d.DINING_INTRODUCTION, d.DINING_DETAILINFO, (SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = d.DINING_ID AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'MAIN' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS DINING_MAIN_IMAGE, (SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = d.DINING_ID AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'LOGO' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS DINING_LOGO_IMAGE FROM DINING d WHERE d.DINING_ID = #{diningId}
SELECT IMAGE_URL FROM DINING_IMAGE WHERE DINING_ID = #{diningId} AND IMAGE_TYPE = 'CAROUSEL' ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER
